verses.verse: Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>When<s%> I <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> on a <S%H776>land,<s%> if the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of their <S%H7097>coasts,<s%> and <S%H5414>set<s%> him for their <S%H6822>watchman:<s%>
If when he <S%H7200>sees<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> on the <S%H776>land,<s%> he <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%>

Then whoever <S%H8085>hears<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and takes not <S%H2094>warning;<s%> if the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> him away, his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be on his own <S%H7218>head.<s%>

He <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and took not <S%H2094>warning;<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be on him. But he that takes <S%H2094>warning<s%> shall <S%H4422>deliver<s%> his <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

But <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H6822>watchman<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> and <S%H8628>blow<s%> not the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> be not <S%H2094>warned;<s%> if the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%> from among them, he is <S%H3947>taken<s%> away in his <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I <S%H1875>require<s%> at the <S%H6822>watchman's<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

So you, O <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> you a <S%H6822>watchman<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> therefore you shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> at my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H2094>warn<s%> them from me.

When I <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> O <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man, you shall surely <S%H4191>die;<s%> if you do not <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> from his <S%H1870>way,<s%> that <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I <S%H1245>require<s%> at your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Nevertheless, <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> of his <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> from it; if he do not <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H1870>way,<s%> he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> but you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

Therefore, O you <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3651>Thus<s%> you <S%H559>speak,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>If<s%> our <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> and our <S%H2403>sins<s%> be on us, and we <S%H4743>pine<s%> away in them, <S%H349>how<s%> should we then <S%H2421>live?<s%>

<S%H559>Say<s%> to them, As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> I have <S%H518>no<s%> <S%H2654>pleasure<s%> in the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> but that the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H1870>way<s%> and <S%H2421>live:<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> you, <S%H7725>turn<s%> you from your <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>ways;<s%> for <S%H4100>why<s%> will you <S%H4191>die,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

Therefore, you <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H5971>people,<s%> The <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall not <S%H5337>deliver<s%> him in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H6588>transgression:<s%> as for the <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> he shall not <S%H3782>fall<s%> thereby in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H7725>turns<s%> from his <S%H7562>wickedness;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H2421>live<s%> for his righteousness in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H2398>sins.<s%>

When I shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> that he shall surely <S%H2421>live;<s%> if he <S%H982>trust<s%> to his own <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H6666>righteousnesses<s%> shall not be <S%H2142>remembered;<s%> but for his <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> that he has <S%H6213>committed,<s%> he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> for it.

Again, when I <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> You shall surely <S%H4191>die;<s%> if he <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H2403>sin,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right;<s%>

If the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H2258>pledge,<s%> <S%H7999>give<s%> <S%H7999>again<s%> that he had <S%H1500>robbed,<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H2708>statutes<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> <S%H1115>without<s%> <S%H6213>committing<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity;<s%> he shall surely <S%H2421>live,<s%> he shall not <S%H4191>die.<s%>

<S%H3808>None<s%> of his <S%H2403>sins<s%> that he has <S%H2398>committed<s%> shall be <S%H2142>mentioned<s%> to him: he has <S%H6213>done<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right;<s%> he shall surely <S%H2421>live.<s%>

Yet the <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>equal:<s%> but as for them, their <S%H1870>way<s%> is not <S%H8505>equal.<s%>
When the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7725>turns<s%> from his <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H6213>commits<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> he shall even <S%H4191>die<s%> thereby.
But if the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H7564>wickedness,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right,<s%> he shall <S%H2421>live<s%> thereby.

Yet you <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>equal.<s%> O you <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> you <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> after his <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of our <S%H1546>captivity,<s%> in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> month, in the <S%H2568>fifth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that one that had <S%H6412>escaped<s%> out of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H5221>smitten.<s%>

Now the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was on me in the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> he that was <S%H6412>escaped<s%> <S%H935>came;<s%> and had <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H935>came<s%> to me in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> and my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> was <S%H6605>opened,<s%> and I was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H481>dumb.<s%>
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> they that <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H2723>wastes<s%> of the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>speak,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> was <S%H259>one,<s%> and he <S%H3423>inherited<s%> the <S%H776>land:<s%> but we are <S%H7227>many;<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> us for <S%H4181>inheritance.<s%>

<S%H3651>Why<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> You <S%H398>eat<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5375>lift<s%> up your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> your <S%H1544>idols,<s%> and <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood:<s%> and shall you <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land?<s%>

You <S%H5975>stand<s%> on your <S%H2719>sword,<s%> you <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H8441>abomination,<s%> and you <S%H2930>defile<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H802>wife:<s%> and shall you <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land?<s%>

<S%H559>Say<s%> you <S%H3541>thus<s%> to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> they that are in the <S%H2723>wastes<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and him that is in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> to be <S%H398>devoured,<s%> and they that be in the <S%H4679>forts<s%> and in the <S%H4631>caves<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> of the <S%H1698>pestilence.<s%>

For I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> most <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> and the <S%H1347>pomp<s%> of her <S%H5797>strength<s%> shall <S%H7673>cease;<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> that <S%H369>none<s%> shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> through.

Then shall they <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I have <S%H5414>laid<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> most <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>committed.<s%>

Also, you <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%> still are <S%H1696>talking<s%> against you by the <S%H7023>walls<s%> and in the <S%H6607>doors<s%> of the <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H2297>one<s%> to <S%H259>another,<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H935>Come,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, and <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is the <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H3318>comes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And they <S%H935>come<s%> to you as the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> and they <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you as my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they <S%H8085>hear<s%> your <S%H1697>words,<s%> but they will not <S%H6213>do<s%> them: for with their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> they <S%H6213>show<s%> much <S%H5690>love,<s%> but their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1980>goes<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1215>covetousness.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>see,<s%> you are to them as a <S%H5690>very<s%> <S%H5690>lovely<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> of one that has a <S%H3303>pleasant<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and can <S%H5059>play<s%> well on an instrument: for they <S%H8085>hear<s%> your <S%H1697>words,<s%> but they <S%H6213>do<s%> them not.
And when this <S%H935>comes<s%> to pass, <S%H2009>(see,<s%> it will <S%H935>come,<s%>) then shall they <S%H3045>know<s%> that a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> has <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.
